alert.note: Alert for Koochiching (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 11:28AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Koochiching County through NOON CDT... At 1126 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Birchdale, moving northeast at 20 mph. Additional storms are expected to form and track through this area over the next hour. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. Heavy rain is also expected. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Birchdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
